name: Segfault[0]: Mad Hatter
description:
As a hacker-for-hire, you've stumbled into a system unlike any you've ever encountered. Now you're a prisoner and a lab rat, but you have someone on the outside.

What kind of a test subject will you be?

This interactive fiction features branching storylines, stat tracking, and five-ish endings to unlock.

Created for the #WAGChallenge Write-A-Game Challenge, June 2015.

Est. playtime: 15-20 mins on average depending on reading speed and optional dialogue paths explored.
